content.question: Which of the following may explain why some people experience growth after a traumatic experience?

choices.label: Some people are genetically predisposed to interpret stress as eustress instead of distress.
Some cultures may encourage people to interpret stress as a challenge rather than an obstacle.
Some people have evolved to interpret trauma as opportunities for growth.
Some people will comply with authority figures who demand they view trauma as a growth opportunity.

content.answer: Some cultures may encourage people to interpret stress as a challenge rather than an obstacle.

skill.text: 1.B: Explain how cultural norms, expectations, and circumstances, as well as cognitive biases apply to behavior and mental processes.
